mapper.select: SELECT a.dt AS day , NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT b.mem_id), 0) AS register_cnt, NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT c.qna_num), 0) AS qna_cnt, NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT d.review_num), 0) AS review_cnt FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7 + LEVEL, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(mem_register_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS day, mem_id FROM members WHERE mem_register_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(sysdate-6,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate+1 , 'YYYY.MM.DD')) b, (SELECT TO_CHAR(qna_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS day, qna_num FROM qna WHERE qna_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(sysdate-6,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate+1 , 'YYYY.MM.DD')) c, (SELECT TO_CHAR(review_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS day, review_num FROM reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(sysdate-6,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate+1 , 'YYYY.MM.DD')) d WHERE a.dt = b.day(+) AND a.dt = c.day(+) AND a.dt = d.day(+) GROUP BY a.dt ORDER BY a.dt DESC

SELECT SUM(daily_sales) AS daily_sales_total, SUM(daily_sales_cnt) AS sales_cnt_total FROM (SELECT a.dt AS day , NVL(SUM(b.total_price), 0) AS daily_sales, NVL(COUNT(b.total_price), 0) AS daily_sales_cnt FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7 + LEVEL, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS day , total_price FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(sysdate-6,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate+1 , 'YYYY.MM.DD')) b WHERE a.dt = b.day(+) GROUP BY a.dt)

SELECT SUM(register_cnt) AS register_cnt_total, SUM(qna_cnt) AS qna_cnt_total, SUM(review_cnt) AS review_cnt_total FROM (SELECT a.dt AS day , NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT b.mem_id), 0) AS register_cnt, NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT c.qna_num), 0) AS qna_cnt, NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT d.review_num), 0) AS review_cnt FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7 + LEVEL, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(mem_register_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS day, mem_id FROM members WHERE mem_register_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(sysdate-6,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate+1 , 'YYYY.MM.DD')) b, (SELECT TO_CHAR(qna_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS day, qna_num FROM qna WHERE qna_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(sysdate-6,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate+1 , 'YYYY.MM.DD')) c, (SELECT TO_CHAR(review_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS day, review_num FROM reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(sysdate-6,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate+1 , 'YYYY.MM.DD')) d WHERE a.dt = b.day(+) AND a.dt = c.day(+) AND a.dt = d.day(+) GROUP BY a.dt)
